title: Holiday Knights
description: The heroes and villains of Gotham City have various adventures during the Christmas holiday season.

title: Sins of the Father
description: A young street kid finds himself hunted by Two-Face and the boy insists that he help Batman stop the villain.

title: Cold Comfort
description: Batman and Batgirl hunt Mr. Freeze who is on a destructively nihilistic campaign.

title: Never Fear
description: The Scarecrow threatens to unleash a powerful new toxin on Gotham City that removes all fear, leaving its victims unafraid of deadly danger. Complications arise when Batman is exposed to the gas.

title: You Scratch My Back
description: Catwoman entices the estranged Nightwing to cooperate with her against a gangster over Batman's wishes.

title: Double Talk
description: Arnold Wesker, The Ventriloquist, is released from Arkham Asylum, deemed a healthy man - only to discover that his alternate personality Scarface may still be struggling to return.

title: Joker's Millions
description: A destitute Joker unaccountably inherits a fortune from a hated gangster, only to find out the hard way that there's an embarrassing catch to the boon.

title: Growing Pains
description: Robin tries to help a mysterious lost little girl against the equally unknown man pursuing her.

title: Mean Seasons
description: Batman and Batgirl oppose Calender Girl, a mysterious woman who is attacking various youth oriented media events.

title: The Demon Within
description: Klarion the Witch Boy takes control of Etrigan the Demon and the Dynamic Duo must stop his destructive mischief.

title: Over the Edge
description: Batman and his allies apparently have their secret identities exposed and are now are hunted by the police.

title: Torch Song
description: A rock singer is stalked by an obsessive pyrotechnician turned supervillain, Firefly.

title: Love Is a Croc
description: Seeing a kindred spirit, Baby-Doll springs Croc from custody to her lover and partner in crime.

title: The Ultimate Thrill
description: Batman contends with Roxy Rocket, a stuntwoman-turned-criminal who gets a real thrill out of taking dangerous risks.

title: Critters
description: A ruined agricultural breeder of dangerously oversized livestock plots his revenge on Gotham City.

title: Cult of the Cat
description: Catwoman is pursued by a fanatical cat themed cult.

title: Animal Act
description: The animals from Nightwing's old circus are now inexplicably committing crimes.

title: Old Wounds
description: Dick Grayson reveals to his successor the secret of the strained relationships with his mentor and Barbara Gordon.

title: Legends of the Dark Knight
description: A group of kids share their stories about Batman that are colored by their different perceptions of him.

title: Girls' Nite Out
description: When Livewire escapes in Gotham City, Supergirl and Batgirl team up to find her, but the supervillainess has joined with Harley Quinn and Poison Ivy herself.

title: Chemistry
description: Bruce Wayne falls for and marries the perfect woman who has a dark secret.

title: Judgment Day
description: Batman investigates the sudden appearance of "The Judge," a faceless vigilante who battles Gotham City's supervillains with lethal force.

title: Beware the Creeper
description: The Joker throws a reporter into a vat of chemicals and turns him into the manically wacky superhero, The Creeper.

title: Mad Love
description: Harley Quinn tries to impress her love while the origin of her career as The Joker's sidekick is revealed.
